content: this is a summary of a legal text explaining the progress of a court case the case was heard in the district court of ljubljana involving a plaintiff and a defendant the purpose of the case was to determine the division of coowned property the court ruled that the properties in question are coowned by both parties with each having a 50 share the defendant has been ordered to pay the plaintiffs legal costs within 15 days the judgment can be enforced the text also mentions that the applicant and the defendant lived together for 28 years and acquired property and funds together the court determined that the property in question is coowned by the parties and their shares should be equal the court also addressed the defendants objection regarding other assets ruling that they are not subject to division the judgment consists of 10 parts and the court has awarded the applicant a total of eur 261025 in legal costs the defendant must reimburse the applicant within 15 days or else they will have to pay statutory default interest the text explains the process of appealing a judgment stating that it can be done within 30 days of receiving a written copy of the judgment the appeal must be written and submitted to the ljubljana high court including the grounds for the appeal a court fee must be paid when lodging the appeal
